docs.snippet: Jurickson Profar, the prized prospect who was supposed to be the opening day second baseman for the Texas Rangers, will be out an estimated 10 to 12 weeks with a muscle tear in his right shoulder....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jurickson Profar, the prized prospect who was supposed to be the opening day second baseman for the Texas Rangers, will be out an estimated 10 to 12 weeks with a muscle tear in his right shoulder.

headline.main: Rangers' Profar Out 10-12 Weeks With Shoulder Tear

docs.lead_paragraph: Gareth Evans, director of the new movie “The Raid 2: Berandal,” achieves a brutally realistic action aesthetic by deliberately limiting his cinematic tools.
docs.abstract: Gareth Evans, director of The Raid 2: Berandal, is becoming one of action cinema's fastest rising stars, developing clearly defined style that adheres to deliberate limitations and rules for desired effect.

headline.seo: By Setting Limits, Gareth Evans Hones an Action Aesthetic

headline.main: Don Knauss of Clorox, on Putting Your Followers First
